channel.title: Pdf on L. Collado-Torres
channel.description: Recent content in Pdf on L. Collado-Torres

item.title: Adding youtube videos in pdfs, html reports and html presentations
item.description: I got a question today on how to add a video to a beamer pdf presentation. Well, I had never done it, but I got curious enough to google around for a bit and here is the end product. One way of doing it is using the media9 tex package. For this to work you need to have the latest version of texlive (or miktex). Then, it’s quite straight forward to include the video.
